Segment.name: BMS
Segment.comment: To indicate the beginning of the Material Safety Data Sheet Transaction Set, identify the distinct type of report, and transmit key identifying numbers and dates relating to that report

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: LanguageCode
Field.comment: Code designating the language used in text, from a standard code list maintained by the International Standards Organization (ISO 639)

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification1
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: RevisionValue1
Field.comment: Revision or engineering change level of the data items referred to by the specification number

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification2
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: RevisionValue2
Field.comment: Revision or engineering change level of the data items referred to by the specification number

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency
